title: ‘One of the Coolest Things Out There Right Now’: The Web3 Gaming World Talks Nifty Island
description: Island-based sandbox game Nifty Island has been drawing plaudits from crypto gaming streamers and reviewers.

title: CFTC Chair calls on Congress to fill gap in crypto regulation
description: Chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Rostin Behnam again asks the U.S. Congress to take active action in crypto regulation.

title: Saylor: Bitcoin ETFs surpass traditional assets, MicroStrategy expands to $700m investment
description: MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor sees Bitcoin ETFs outpacing gold and rivaling the S&P 500, with the company preparing a $700 million Bitcoin investment.

title: PUSHD enters new presale stage; Cardano and Ripple rift
description: Amidst growing tensions within Cardano and Ripple communities, investors pivot to the Pushd presale. #partnercontent

title: Troubled New York Bank Receiving $1,000,000,000 Liquidity Injection in Push to Save Ailing Lender
description:
An ailing New York bank just announced an injection of $1 billion in capital in a push to stay afloat. New York Community Bank says the infusion was led by former U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin’s Liberty Strategic Capital, as well as Hudson Bay and Reverence Capital. In a press release, Mnuchin says he believes […]

The post Troubled New York Bank Receiving $1,000,000,000 Liquidity Injection in Push to Save Ailing Lender appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
